languages.text: "Я была впечатлена твоим решением даровать права обитателям столичного мира. Другие правители боятся своих подданных, но не ты".
"I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."
languages.original_text: "Я была впечатлена твоим решением даровать права обитателям столичного мира. Другие правители боятся своих подданных, но не ты".

traits.locale_text: "I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."
"I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."
"I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."
"I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."
"I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."

languages.text: "Ich war beeindruckt von Eurer Entscheidung, den Bewohnern Eurer Hauptwelt Rechte einzuräumen. Die meisten Herrscher fürchten ihre Untertanen, aber Ihr seid anders."
languages.original_text: "I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war beeindruckt von Eurer Entscheidung, den Bewohnern Eurer Hauptwelt Rechte einzuräumen. Die meisten Herrscher fürchten ihre Untertanen, aber Ihr seid anders."

languages.text: « Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que vous accordiez des droits aux habitants de votre monde-capitale. La plupart des souverains ont peur de leurs sujets, mais ce n'est pas votre cas. »
languages.original_text: "I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que vous accordiez des droits aux habitants de votre monde-capitale. La plupart des souverains ont peur de leurs sujets, mais ce n'est pas votre cas. »

languages.text: 「首都惑星の人々に権利を与えるというあなたの決断に心を打たれたのだ。多くの支配者は自身の臣民を恐れているが、あなたはそのような人ではなかった」
languages.original_text: "I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."

traits.locale_text: 「首都惑星の人々に権利を与えるというあなたの決断に心を打たれたのだ。多くの支配者は自身の臣民を恐れているが、あなたはそのような人ではなかった」

languages.text: «Me impresionó su decisión de otorgar derechos a la gente de su mundo capital. La mayoría de los gobernantes temen a sus súbditos, pero usted no».
languages.original_text: "I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."

traits.locale_text: «Me impresionó su decisión de otorgar derechos a la gente de su mundo capital. La mayoría de los gobernantes temen a sus súbditos, pero usted no».

languages.text: “你决定将权力赋予首都世界的人民，这给我留下了深刻的印象。绝大多数统治者都惧怕他们的臣民，但你并不是这样的人。”
languages.original_text: "I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."

traits.locale_text: “你决定将权力赋予首都世界的人民，这给我留下了深刻的印象。绝大多数统治者都惧怕他们的臣民，但你并不是这样的人。”

languages.text: "Başdünyandaki insanlara haklar tanıma kararından etkilendim. Hükümdarların çoğu, tebaasından korkar. Sen korkmuyorsun."
languages.original_text: "I was impressed by your decision to grant rights to the people of your capital world. Most rulers are afraid of their subjects, but you are not one of them."
